website_summaries.verdict: Best choice to draw out poison from skin and stop rash from spreading. Longest lasting relief on the market.
pros: Reviewers swear this over the counter scrub works as well as prescription creams, antibiotics, and steroids
Scrub instantly relieves itch for hours
Feels oh-so-good when your skin feels oh-so-bad
cons: For best results, use before blisters form, when the rash is still in a small red dot phase
Keep this stocked so you don't have to wait for shipping

customer_reviews.title: Nearly 24 hours of relief!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was tempted to be skeptical about this product, but with 3000+ reviews and a 4.5 rating, I had to give it a try. After spending two weeks of being driven crazy with poison ivy itch on my arm, hips, and legs, I purchased it and this stuff is magic. After taking a shower with it, I experienced nearly 24 hours of no itching. Cannot recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: SMZ

customer_reviews.title: This is the one that works
customer_reviews.text: There are home remedys for poison ivy, this one works. Follow the directions, and for best results use the Tecnu spray (advertised on the purchase screen as an add-on). The spray will last a whole lot longer, it does not take much. The scrub removes the oil, the spray keeps it from spreading.
customer_reviews.author: TomOinGburg

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I am horribly allergic to poison ivy (think immediate steroid prescription) and have used the Tecnu wash for years if I even suspect I've had contact with the plant. It has never failed me if I catch it in time, and in cases when I've realized it too late, it has seriously minimized the reaction. This scrub is even better -- the wash requires you to rub your skin for 2 full minutes before rinsing. This only requires 15 seconds of rubbing. If you spend time working in your garden, hiking, or anything outdoors, this should absolutely be in your first aid arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: mamamusician

customer_reviews.title: Scrubin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seems to work initially yet not if you come in straight contact and have blistered rash. I put it on the rash that is mildly present and it seems to make a difference yet not fully relief and remedy the reaction. I give it four stars because it reliefs the itching mostly yet I wouldn't say it's extremely effective. Id suggest other remedies as well along with this one. Also, be sure to use a scrub brush with this as well, to make it more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked wonders on a friend mine that got poison ivy real bad. I mean really, really bad. She's extremely allergic and her entire body had a horrible reaction. There were rashes all over her that were oozing puss... yeah, it was awful. We did also take her to the emergency room but they didn't do much except prescribe some medication. Over the next few days the meds ran out but she was still using this. It cleared her up completely. No scars or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Draggon

customer_reviews.title: BEST STUFF EVER
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST STUFF ON THE PLANET FOR POISON IVY OR ANY ITCHY BUG BITE!!!!! The scrub is by far the only Tecnu product I need and want. The scrub takes the itching away within 15 seconds- nothing else does what this stuff does. Can you tell I love it? I garden, horseback ride, always getting bit or poison ivy - i have two of these scrubs- one upstairs and one downstairs. Thank you Tec Labs.
customer_reviews.author: alicatz

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend trying.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on pharmacist recommendation as had poison ivy on right arm which I’ve never gotten before. This seemed to provide some relief. It didn't take the ivy away. I believe it played a role though. It’s a hard call. It depends on the severity of your infection. The scrub is nice & soothing. My review is personal obviously. I believe Tecnu makes a nice product. It may seem I’m torn in leaving this review as I’m half & half. The price was good vs. the store buy & I got it the following day
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Must use right at the first signs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scrub because I'm highly allergic to poison ivy. Unfortunately, I've got a lot of it in my yard, so I'm breaking out continuously. I've finally got smart and bought a painter suit, but I thought this might help with an existing reaction. However, it did not. The second time I got in contact with the ivy, I used it, and it did help minimize the reaction, though not completely. I think this really is soap with a type of sand in it, and nothing really specific for ivy, etc. It seems like I could use a pumice stone to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: My go-to
customer_reviews.text: I'm not allergic to poison ivy, but I have a brushy backyard and I do occasionally get tagged. This cuts my outbreaks at least in half. The directions say to scrub gently for 15 seconds. Make sure you do that. The first time I used it I was so itchy and it felt so good...but then it started to sting, so yeah...GENTLY for 15 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Z

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cleaning off poison ivy oils!
customer_reviews.text: I've got lots of poison ivy around my house - and this scrub is GREAT at cleaning off the poison ivy oils after I've been working in my yard. I almost never get poison ivy anymore since I've started using this after I've been working near it. At the most I get a few small patches, and it's my fault for not scrubbing well enough with the tecnu scrub
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Tecnu products are amazing! They keep even the toughest exposures to poison ivy/oak at bay and if you do happen to miss somewhere and get it anyway...it clears it up FAST. I buy Technu yearly since we are surrounded by poison ivy and oak in our woods. It's been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: RMAC

customer_reviews.title: works but not 100%
customer_reviews.text: i get severe poison ivy rashes on a yearly basis, this year i was told about this product. i work vegetation control so my job puts me against the worst. this year both my forearms are already covered in blister rash marks, after applying this 3 x in 24 hours its receded about 30% of the rash and has slightly improved the itchiness. much better then not having done anything at all!
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Amen II!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. When used religiously, it prevents attacks. I am very allergic to poison ivy, but with the help of Tecnu products I have a routine that works. I use this type mostly for a thorough wash in the shower for all over my body. I use the liquid for a quick wash and for clothes and tools. I use the scrub to really rid my body of the toxic oil.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: This is the only produt that eliminates Poison Ivy almost on contact
customer_reviews.text: Tecnu is the only brand I use for poison ivy, I am highly allergic but an avid hiker and way to often end up with poison ivy, this is the only product I have found that works almost on contact. After using I no longer need to get shots when I get an outbreak of poison ivy, I simply shower with Tecnu Extreme when coming in and in most cases I never see an outbreak. My medicine cabinet is never without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Berry

customer_reviews.title: It works! Will only buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I found out the hard way that I have poison ivy in my backyard. After a week of suffering through it the itchiness and the pain, I bought this product to find some kind of relief. Hydrocortisone and Calamine we're not really doing the trick and I had to reapply several times throughout the day. after doing this within 24 hours you start to see a difference. Within 72 hours it's almost all gone. All the swelling has gone away and welts are gone. Only the redness remains and very minimal itch Can not recommend enough I will only use this again. Buy it and you finally get some relief. I also use the soothing spray as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H.

customer_reviews.title: better than anything in stores!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is the BEST!!! Feels good to use and the relief it gives is amazing. I have poison ivy all over my arms and hands and went a week doing all the traditional things. Nothing worked until this arrived- highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I Cut my daughters backyard weeds and bushes about three weeks prior. Began noticing bumps on my arm, and then they started spreading all over my body. The wife said it might be poison ivy...and sure enough she was right. I suffered for about a week and a half, trying different ointments to clear and sooth itching, and nothing worked. Came to Amazon, and looked at different products and reviews. Tecnu was rated very good, and I could not be happier. After applying, my itching and uncomfortableness eased a whole lot. I applied two to thjree times a day, areas began scabbing, and healing. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G.

customer_reviews.title: Best topical cream for the money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly was skeptical but it works as well as the more expensive name brand stuff. The little plastic particles in here scrape the rash open to apply the medicine. Generally I find that two applications about four hours apart really does a number on the rash. The first application is scary because it opens the weeping wounds but that's what it is supposed to do. The second application I find is when the calming starts. And by the third (especially if you do it all in one day) the rash starts to really reduce.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works unbelievable fast!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! I'm extremely allergic to poison ivy but didn't want to go to the doctor with Covid-19 and being at high risk. I purchased this and within days to 1 week I was almost fully clear of poison ivy! I highly recommend this to any and everyone who suffers from posion ivy allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson

customer_reviews.title: Use this to prevent or lessen poison ivy outbreaks
customer_reviews.text: This product is go to all summer. Every my husband and I would suffer from the itchy blisters. Always wear gloves to lessen your exposure. But, then you have to touch the gloves to take them off. Use cold water and follow the directions. I use the product every time I do yard work. I have not had an outbreak in three years since we discovered this. It removes the oils that cause the rash. Do not shower until exposed boy areas have been gently cleaned with this first. Otherwise, you will transfer the oils to places they don’t belong...
customer_reviews.author: Gail J.

customer_reviews.title: A gift from god!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is not some magic potion... but it works! I recommend getting the anti itch spray (same product line) with it to best avoid itching. HOWEVER... if you use this additional method after washing with this product in the (cool) shower you will SIGNIFICANTLY improve in no time: Mix Hydrogen peroxide, rubbing alcohol and epsom salts (the plain kind) to make a paste. Rub it on your rash (it will probably burn a little) and wait for it to dry, then brush the salt off your skin. Finish with the anti-itch spray. You'll thank me later. I had a terrible, widespread poison ivy rash that got 75% better in 3 days using all of these methods together. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem to help at all
customer_reviews.text: I work outdoors and sometimes I come in contact with poison ivy. I got sick of it coming back on my legs for weeks so I tried this out and it didn't seem to help at all. The severity or duration of what I'm accustomed to dealing with poison ivy wasn't lowered with the use of this product. This stuff is also kinda pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, two washes and the ivy was gone, seriously . Ill probably get posion ivy from just writing this but I'm glad I have this scrub to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Very hard on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I got a horrendous case of poison ivy this summer. I tried everything & someone suggested this brand to me. I like the other products. This one exfoliates to get the oil off you. But, it was so harsh, it felt like it was scraping my skin & sores off and my skin was extremely sore afterwards. I will not use this scrub again, but I’ll use their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: This is a life savior
customer_reviews.text: Whenever there's a poison Ivy in my backyard, it must be me that picks it up for some unknown reason. Karma? Not sure. But this helps correct that karma and it works good. You need to be persistent and wash your skin I would say 3 times per day when you get poisoned. This is way cheaper than the other Zanfel, and it works almost as good. However, you can buy 4 packages at the same price. I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Reljin

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing poison ivy oils
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Technu lotion to wash when I come in from the garden. I just tried this scrub and like it better. The scrubbing action makes me feel like I am getting more oil off of me. A lifesaver for people highly allergic like me!
customer_reviews.author: HMC Bucks County PA

customer_reviews.title: Itch no more, clear skin back in a few days .....
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped my poison ivy in its tracks..... it’s like a mechanics sand soap just rub where ever your infected & the itch stops & the Lil red blisters break open & then calms your skin down and within three days all clear. Worked great for me I keep one tube in my locker at work & one home ... Highly recommended !’n
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing poison ivy/oak scrub ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who has had a huge breakout from poison oak for about a week and nothing was working. He showered with this the day it came in, and I swear he came out of the shower a totally different man! He hasn't itched once since Saturday (it is now Monday evening), and his rashes are already starting to disappear. He would rate this 100/10!
customer_reviews.author: McPherson Family

customer_reviews.title: The Best for me
customer_reviews.text: I will use nothing but Tecnu, be it the spray or cream. I wish they had a lotion to along with it like in a pump bottle. When you look up Tecnu lotion, it just shows you the cream. But it is amazing stuff, I keep it on hand at all times.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!!! I have an awful time with poison ivy/oak. We live in the country and its every where here. For many yrs now, every summer I have an extreme breakout all over my body. Already did a round of steroids this summer and it came back. I figured why not try this product. I just used in the shower, the all over care cause its everywhere, and I have been itch free ever since! Its only been a couple of hrs but I'm extremely impressed. I feel so stupid for not trying this before!! Trust me you wont be dissoppointed. As a bonus my skin is super soft and silky! WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ogg

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure of the price point but the product worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I pushed back tall weeds and was surprised by long thorns that scratched my forearm. The scratches blistered and my wrist around my watch became enflamed in a oozing rash. I took a shower and was concerned when I had itchy blistering hot spot erupting all over my body. I though I would need a shot from the doctor. I ordered this product. I used it generously and vigorously every few hours in the bath. The itching stopped. The rash iis drying up and healing naturally. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Healey

customer_reviews.title: It works! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well and is a lifesaver for me. I’m super sensitive to poison ivy/oak and one little brush can escalate into a rash all over my body. I always have this scrub and the Original Tecnu was on hand all the time. I feel better doing yard work knowing I can scrub down with this to take care of any urushiol. Tecnu products also help reduce rashes if I do end up breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne D.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Non-Drying
customer_reviews.text: Vowing to get poison ivy no more, I have washed my hands and forearms with the Tecnu Scrub after each period of yard work all summer. It has been effective, and my skin feels soft after use. The grains in the scrub are not uncomfortable at all and give me peace of mind that they are scrubbing away any chance of the unmistakable itch of poison ivy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that works for me. When I know that I have touched poison ivy I immediately use this and do not get a rash. I am highly allergic to poison ivy too!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: The best for plant contact allergy
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid gardener and enjoy growing tomatoes. However I am very allergic to the tomato leaves and stems and develop a severe rash with plant contact. I discovered Tecnu years ago and used the regular soap after plant contact with good results. The soap requires two minutes of contact to work. The Tecnu Extreme advertises needing only 15 seconds of contact time, and they are right!. In addition it has a mild abrasive material in the product that helps remove soil and plant material. I have several tubes of this product on hand, both outdoors and indoors, in addition to the liquid soap (which is slightly less expensive. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timetu Shop

customer_reviews.title: Works 100%
customer_reviews.text: Had poison oak for over two weeks. Started spreading behind my knees which is completely miserable. 24 hours of using this stuff and 90% of the rash was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Tony45

customer_reviews.title: Medicine cabinet staple - best anti-poison ivy ever
customer_reviews.text: I get severe reactions to poison ivy. This stuff is the only relief I have ever gotten. Double duty - soothes the itch and pain but most importantly, gets that oil off. I use it preventively after being in the garden and so rarely get poison ivy anymore. But I still get an occasional unexplained case from who knows where and then this stuff saves me.
customer_reviews.author: felicidad

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better price for effective product than what i used in the past. This is a huge tube and it WORKED. 3 days and done. I am highly allergic to poison ivy so I will keep this nearby.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY F DEVLIN

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever found for treating poison ivy. I have very fair/sensitive skin and I seem to get poison ivy every summer. This product really remove the oils and dried up poison ivy fast! I noticed a different after one use. It is really effective unlike a lot of other product out there that do very little. This is essential and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good not bad....
customer_reviews.text: I still don't know it help or not, but I know better then nothing, also this thing it feel good when you try to clean of your poison ivy on your arm or leg it feel so good... Oh the cream have litte sand in side, it help clean the skin better.... Also some one told Me used dish washer soap it work too...
customer_reviews.author: Irongohon

customer_reviews.title: LOOK no Further!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING stuff.. I’m the girl if the wind blows wrong I bet it.. and usually have to go to the doctor and get a steroid shot.. I googled the best for poison oak.. This came up.. I ordered on Sat morning, I was at the mail Box Monday as man man ran.. if it didn’t work I was going to the doctor.. I got immediate relief!! It works!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This, baking soda, and theratree tea tree scrub worked well on my poison oak. I'm one of those people that gets it really bad when they get poison oil rash. It just keeps spreading. The exfoliation feels great and it really cuts down on the itching. It seems to dry up the area for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Williams

customer_reviews.title: It does work !
customer_reviews.text: After trying several products this one knocked out the Poison Ivy infection stone cold. However it also sucked the moisture from my hands to the point where they looked like a 90 years old hands. I'm in my 50's. It took 3 weeks of constantly using moisturizing gels to get my hands back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I live on 10 acres thats heavily wooded and lots of Poison Oak. Loving to garden and be outside, I have gotten poison oak rash a few times. Miserable. I began using this scrub every time I shower after working on the property, haven’t gotten a rash since! A little pricey, BUT I think worth it over the rash!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J Beloussow

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff; bought when my son was working on a landscape crew & was exposed to poison ivy daily. Best to use every day after exposure but it helps even if you've already broken out. A lifesaver if you're allergic!
customer_reviews.author: merzonia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work. Especially since it is a lower cost than others, but unfortunately I think it would require using it non-stop for several days before I removed the poison ivy oil from my skin. Maybe it works better if you wash immediately after exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Temporarily stops the itching
customer_reviews.text: This was highly recommended to me and I was somewhat disappointed because while it did stop the itching, it was only very temporary and it did NOT stop the spreading like I thought it was supposed to. After a few days I was forced to contact a doctor and get medication to help instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Karen L. Demmy

customer_reviews.title: This product really works
customer_reviews.text: I never heard of this brand before but I was getting desperate with itching so I tried it. It really does work, and in 15 seconds like it says on the label. It is a gel, with exfoliating-type crystals in the gel (like the old Lava soap). Run cool water over the skin, gently rub on the gel, wait 15-30 seconds then rinse off with cool water. Instant relief that lasted about 15-18 hours. Not a cure, but gives you some relief while your body heals naturally. I did not have poison ivy so don't know how it will do with that, but had many very itchy bug bites that it worked well on. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Technu Extreme Poison Ivy Scrub works to stop the itch of poison ivy and drys the rash up. Takes about 2 weeks to stop the spread and itch, destroying the oil that causes the rash. I keep a large tube on hand as I get poison ivy every summer. I’m very pleased with this product, recommended to me by a nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Schack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff did wonders for my poison oak. And it feels great when you scrub with it. Enough grit to feel really good on the rash without scratching the skin off. After using it for a couple of days along with some anti itch spray, my rash started fading away. I would recommend this to anybody with poison oak/ivy rash.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I react strongly to poison ivy contact, and thus, have been very careful since discovering that fact. I have several tubes of TECNU around our mountain home. I accidently brushed my arm against some ivy recently, and felt it immediately reacting. I went in and applied the Tecnu as directed, the irritation subsided and never progressed. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McColgan

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver Product
customer_reviews.text: If U get poison ivy buy this product. This product works. I have suffered from poison ivy since childhood because I'm always out in the woods. This product is amazing after a day of tromping around in the woods you take a shower use this product within 6 to 8 hours I promise you you will not wake up the next day with poison ivy. Follow the instructions and use it. This product is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce keffer

customer_reviews.title: Made it Worse
customer_reviews.text: This scrub spread the oils to areas where I did not have poison ivy previously. It made it 10x worse. Does not work.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who runs a landscaping and lawncare business. According to him, this is hands down the best poison ivy treatment he's ever used. It cuts healing time by 75% and stops the rash from spreading almost completely. It's expensive, but absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: It exfoliates which feels really good for the itch without actually itching the poison oak i had all over my face and stomach. I had a severe reaction so it was hard to tell how much it helped but it felt good to use and my roommate is using it now for her poison ivy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I get poison ivy just by passing by it. After working outside I take a shower using this as soon as I come in. I have not had poison ivy in 2 years. Formerly I got it every single year blister horror and all. No more. It is expensive but worth it because it really does work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe they could improve on the original
customer_reviews.text: This works even better than the original. You don’t have to scrub for nearly as long. I buy this stuff in bulk and wash with it every time I do yard work. Almost two years poison ivy (oak) free. As opposed to going to the doctor for prednisone 3x every summer.
customer_reviews.author: BuysALot

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly allergic to poison ivy and poison oak... this will take care of it QUICKLY! Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Does work
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered through the worst episode of posion Ivey. It has helped to stop the spread and has not damaged my skin which is quite delicate. I think its best to use two-three times a day for best effect in removing the poison Ivey oil.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Takes the itch right out!
customer_reviews.text: I had poison ivy on my arms. This product instantly brought relief. It took the itch right out and lasted several hours. The bit of grittiness in the gel felt soothing and good on my itchy skin. It has a very light, pleasant smell. This was the first time I've ever had poison ivy, so I had no idea what product to purchase. I bought this on a whim, based on the reviews, and I was not disappointed. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub
customer_reviews.text: Tecnu is a abrasive scrub which does appear to remove the oils. Whether it shortens the time it takes to get over the rash I can"t say. Relieving the itching for a short time I found that it worked as good as very hot water.
customer_reviews.author: C. cordo

customer_reviews.title: Oh thank God for the microbeads!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was sent to us straight from the lord baby Jesus himself! No need to go to the doctor anymore. Stops the itch! And oh the microbeads, thank God for the microbeads! If you have an itchy rash the microbeads feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JwB

customer_reviews.title: This Cream Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cream not only to help poison ivy contact but all bug bites such as mosquitoes and chigger bites. It helps soothe and takes away the itch within minutes after applying. It is the only cream that has been very effective fast and feels good when applied with its sandy texture. Rinsing with cool water after removes most of the grit and leaves a cool sensation,
customer_reviews.author: TXOZ81

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single penny + 1 day shipping
customer_reviews.text: Worth every single penny! I’m very allergic to position ivy. The last time I had poison ivy it lasted around 2 weeks. I started using this scrub and the position ivy was healed after 3 days. The scrub completely stops the itch, I noticed a difference after the first use. This worked so well I sent one to my mom to use and her rash was gone after a day.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra

customer_reviews.title: Very good product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this scrub! I had poison ivy. A very bad one. And scrub helped a lot. For 3-4 hours no itching! Just magic! Thanks a lot. Already recommended it to my friend. Bought 2nd tube, because used each drop of 1st one.
customer_reviews.author: OLLE

customer_reviews.title: Great as a medication, better as a preventative measure.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. I order this every summer and use it after I work in the yard. I have come into contact with poison ivy and since I've been using this product, have not broken out. The first time i used it, it was because I had a poison ivy rash. It does help to calm the rash and probably does shorten the duration, but its best to get it and use it preemptively.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D.

customer_reviews.title: Completely Works
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my car after I used it once. The quicker you put it on after exposure, the more it can do to minimize or eliminated the itch and rash. I don't know why this isn't common knowledge the way Calamine is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False product claims
customer_reviews.text: I wish that this product worked. My hands are covered in poison ivy, keeping me up at night with the itching. I also purchased this company's anti itch product, which also doesn't work. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Platinum

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Having used various poison-ivy remedies over the years, I can report this is by far the best. It really works. A few of the soaps help, but this Tecnu is in a league of its own.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem to work for me!!! Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how quickly it came, however that's the only positive I have! I guess other than it didn't make matters worse! It didn't work for me or make anything better! I wish I hadn't spent the money! Won't buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime D.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am one to get very bad poison ivy but I love the outdoors. So I found this in a chat room and figured I give it a try. Since using it I have not had one outbreak thank goodness! So I would say it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Wipes or Wash, I would suggest wipes for active outdoors men and women
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works and is good to have on hand although I'd recommend the wipes vs wash. The was will work well if you're exposed during yard work etc. and plan to shower but if your camping/hiking etc. wipes make more sense since a nearby shower isn't always an option.
customer_reviews.author: runcix

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for your poison ivy arsenal
customer_reviews.text: YES 100% YES This is part of my routine after returning from the woods and I have seen specks compared to the seeping patches that used to plague me all summer. I will be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Best price that I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for selling this product at a great price for a large amount! My husband greatly appreciates this! This stuff is 2nd only to prescription steroid cream!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Matthews

customer_reviews.title: great to use to fight the invisible oils
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of poison ivy on my property. Poison ivy is tough to kill. So, even being careful wearing long pants and long sleeve shirts, I still get exposed to the poison ivy. Technu Extreme is great to apply to possible affected areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best stuff for poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: so i recently started getting poison ivy late in my life and realized this is the only stuff that works. as long as i shower with it and am consistent with its use, the itching is kept to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: I hate poison oak
customer_reviews.text: This stuff hates poison oak. If you rub it all over your body were exposed in the shower and I can almost guarantee you, you will not get poison oak if you do this within three hours after exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped it cold.
customer_reviews.text: Got poison ivy from weed eating neighbors abandoned yard, from knees to ankles. Took me a few days to figure out what I had. This product stopped it cold! Applied about 5 treatments and all I was left with was some sores. The itching and spreading stopped after first treatment. I have had poison ivy many times over the years and do not remember anything working like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. I had poison Ivy, I used it as prescribed, did not do anything, even it says it helps stops the spread, I think the spots increased after I used it. Not working.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for just incase
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use it yet but when I do need it. I am confident that it will do what it say it will do. I am pretty cautious out in the woods but I have it if we may ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAllKindsOfGear

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: After 4 rounds this season with the poison ivy rash straight from the underworld, this product, if used as directed (15 seconds scrub) and after coming inside from your outdoor work where you may have been exposed, WORKS. It’s a life saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Pennington

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works!! Bought it just in case I needed it. One week later had a run in with poison ivy. Mild case with a few blisters. Washing three times over two days with Tecnu took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have 2 weeks battling this Ivy Rash and nothing seem to work until I tried this Scrub...instant relief after the shower. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Borderline orgasmic
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten poison ivy every year since i can remember. As early as March some seasons, I've tried it all. Been a loyal user of technu products for a few years now, this is the first time I've used the scrub. It works wonders. Feels amazing instantly and cleared it up within a day or two. Cant reccomend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hotsauce

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: Several times now I was sure I would get poison oak but then didn’t after using the Tecnu scrub. I’m normally very sensitive and get terrible rashes, so thus is a godsend. I’m giving it top grade and reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor container, high cost
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, not wild about the container. Hard to get the last 1/3 to come out. That is sad because you get very little of the product as is. I tried the non-extreme product that comes in a better container/quantity/price, but is too thin/watered down and does not work as well. Now they have a larger tube. I just got that and it is a bit of a better deal. Still it is the only product I know of that works as well.
customer_reviews.author: B Batteiger

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS, after yard work I wash with it and prevents poison ivy from even happening. If for some reason you get it product WORKS great to get rid of the urishoil that causes rash, also relieves itching. IT
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great poison ivy solution
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to get cortisone shots to clear up poison ivy. That was before I found this product! If I catch it early enough, I can keep the rash from getting no bigger than the size of a quarter.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyesWhiteMullet

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It helped me alot. I live in an area with lots of poison ivy so we keep this handy. Took my poison ivy about a month to go away completely. Might sound like awhile but I could tell it was helping instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Nica

customer_reviews.title: If applied right after being exposed to poison oak, ...
customer_reviews.text: If applied right after being exposed to poison oak, it can prevent it from turning into a rash. It is also greatly relieves the itch if you do get a rash.
customer_reviews.author: dirtdevil

customer_reviews.title: best we've found for poison oak
customer_reviews.text: I think this works better than regular Technu for most folks because it contains a mild abrasive. My experience is that they fail to really scrub with the regular Technu, using it more like a lotion, which limits its effectiveness. I find that Technu works quite well even after a rash has developed, often stopping it within hours after scrubbing. Be aware, however, that peoples' sensitivities vary greatly and also change over time. My wife and I live in poison oak country and are exposed often. This product has repeatedly saved us much suffering.
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with ya rash I had from overexposure to sun! It helped my skin heal faster and had a cooling effect after I rinsed it off. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My son was so touched that he cried after using this product. It works too well. It works quickly after washing it off and putting it on. It is definitely a good product.
customer_reviews.author: yue zhao

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: If you think you were exposed, follow the instructions and it works. I would not be without one in my medicine chest
customer_reviews.author: Steve of PA

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Product definitely works. Have used this product for the last five years. I will wash with this product immediately after possible contact with poison ivy. I have not seen any signs of the “Ivy” coming back. Wish I knew of this product years ago. It would have saved me many days of not suffering from poison ivy’s notorious side effects -The Itch. I’d recommend this product to anyone who suffers from poison ivy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the right stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scrub. Dries up blisters. Not perfumed. I get into the vines while clearing cedar on the ranch. Technu gives me commercial-grade relief.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Poison Ivy Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff; I keep a tube in the shower because I have a lot of poison ivy, oak, etc., around my area.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped spread
customer_reviews.text: Husband got poison ivy again... got him this in hopes of reducing whine time. Not sure how effective it is since men don’t follow directions... but seems like it helped it not spread
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Caras

customer_reviews.title: Tecnu Scrub really helps!
customer_reviews.text: I used Tecnu Scrub nightly in the shower on my poison ivy inflammations. It helped to relieve the itching, and prepared my skin for the anti-itch cream after showering.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna in Asheville

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! If you have poison ivy, you need this scrub! You’ll get better significantly faster than without it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

product_meta.title: Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub, Removes Poisonous Plant Oils That Cause Rash and Itching, 4 Ounces
product_meta.description: Size:4 Ounce (Pack of 1)Don’t let poison oak or ivy ruin your outdoor plans! Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub is the first step in your poison oak or ivy treatment regimen. Use before or after the rash has appeared. Our special skin cleanser works by washing away urushiol, the toxic resin found in poisonous plants, allowing the skin to begin its natural healing process. Tecnu Extreme is an excellent first choice before a cortisone or hydrocortisone treatment. If the rash has already begun, we recommend using Tecnu Extreme as an all-over body application. Apply product to wet skin. Then gently scrub the affected areas to remove the rash-causing poison ivy oil from your skin. Complete your treatment regimen by following up with an anti-itch and pain relieving gel or spray. Be proactive next time. Tecnu Extreme can also be used before a rash begins. After coming in contact with poisonous plants, apply Tecnu Extreme to exposed areas of skin. If you’re hypersensitive, do an all- over application, since the rash-causing oils are invisible and can spread to other parts of the body. Tecnu products are designed for those who love the outdoors, adventure and exploring. Our product collection includes the Tecnu Original Outdoor Cleanser, Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub, Tecnu Rash Relief Spray and Calagel Anti-Itch Gel. Tecnu products allow you to wander confidently, knowing you have powerful protection and fast-acting itch relief at your fingertips. Tecnu Extreme does not contain plastic microbeads. The exfoliating ingredient in Tecnu Extreme is silicon dioxide (SiO2), also known as silica. It is a natural compound made of two of the earth’s most abundant materials: silicon (Si) and oxygen (O2). Silicon dioxide is most often recognized in the form of quartz, and It’s found naturally in water, plants, animals, and the earth.
feature_bullets: BEST CHOICE IF RASH HAS STARTED - Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub gets to the root of your problem by removing the oil (urushiol) that causes the rash, spreading and itching.
REMOVES THE SOURCE OF ITCHING – If your itching is unbearable, Tecnu Extreme removes the source of the itching to allow your body to begin its natural healing process unimpeded.
SIMPLE & EASY TO USE – Works in 15 seconds. Apply to entire body. Wet skin and apply Tecnu Extreme, gently scrubbing for 15 seconds. Rinse with water (not hot). Gently towel dry. Repeat as necessary.
100% GUARANTEED - Tecnu Extreme is 100% guaranteed, making it a go-to for gardeners, forestry workers, hikers, mountain bikers, campers, landscapers and any fan of the outdoors.
COMPLETE YOUR TREATMENT – After using Tecnu Extreme you can treat any remaining rash symptoms with Calagel Anti-Itch Gel or Tecnu Rash Relief Spray.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
